title: Wayfair to Open Three New Stores
sub_head: Massachusetts-based furniture and home-goods seller becomes latest online retailer to expand its reach into bricks-and-mortar
body:
Online home-goods seller Wayfair Inc. is making its biggest bet yet on physical retail, as it plans to openÂ three new bricks-and-mortar locations in Massachusetts next year.
The retailer will open two stores under its AllModern brand and one location under its Joss & Main brand, the company said.
